description:
Turnover tax advance payments

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73311 Turnover tax statistics (advance returns)

Definition:
Turnover tax prior to deduction of input tax (STR008) less
deductible input tax (STR010).
When deductible input tax and reductions have been taken
into account, there will remain tax payable or a tax refund
claim towards the local tax office, which will be settled by
turnover tax advance payment or repayment
(monthly/quarterly).
